name: Just A Tribute
description:
"This is just a tribute! You gotta believe me!
And I wish you were there! Just a matte..."

AHERM! Oh, hi! Didn't see you there! ;)

This is a game I made for the sake of a game jam (#HonestJam). The theme presented was 'Tribute', so I decided to make it about the Tenacious D song "Tribute".

This is a simple 2D platformer with an awesome ending level. It's worth the wait trust me ;)

There are two endings! It won't be easy, but see if you can get the "good ending".

https://itch.io/jam/honest-jam

*Disclaimer*

All the assets for the game were made originally for this game with the exception of one, the devil in the final level. This was a discarded asset in a separate project that I decided to re-use, as I ran out of time to remake it before the jam deadline.
